For the following case, you may see macha test exceeds timeout even with timeout(6000) setup. Be sure to resolve promise at the end setTimeout.

it('blah', () => ) {
  this.timeout(6000)
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
      helper.request().get('/testurl/' + id)
      .then()//whatever
    resolve() <=== don't forget this!
    }, 5000)
  })
}
